text:
Expenses incurred in connection with the Conference
on Public Radio, October 22-24, at the Motel on the
Mountain, Suffern, New York
Private vehicle: 36 miles & .10 per mile $ 3.60
Taxicab Fare
(La Guardia to Ford Foundation)
(National, Washington, D. C. to residence) $12.85
Gratuities $ 1.50
Air Fare from Washington, D. C. to New
York and return $36.00
TOTAL $53.95
